creator: bobbylcraig
title: Raspberry Pi Door Notifier
description: This project creates a Raspberry Pi-based door notifier that detects vibrations from a moving door and sends an email notification. It utilizes a vibration sensor, Flask, and the Mandrill API.
steps: Wire the vibration sensor to the Raspberry Pi using female-to-female wires according to the provided schematic.
Install the necessary Python libraries using Pip: requests, RPi.GPIO, flask, flask_restful, flask_wtf, wtforms, email, and mandrill.
Set up a basic Flask application on the Raspberry Pi to create a web server.
Create the project files (index.html, __init__.py, forms.py, mcemail.py, routes.py, iotapp.py, vibes.py) and organize them into the specified directory structure.
Obtain a Mandrill API key and place it in the mcemail.py file, adjusting the sending information as needed.
Run the vibes.py script in the background and then start the Flask server using the command `$ python -m flask run --host 0.0.0.0`.
Navigate to the device's URI/IP address and set the email address to receive notifications.
Test the device by tapping the vibration sensor and verifying that a test email is sent.
Mount the device on the door using command strips, ensuring the vibration sensor is perpendicular to the door's motion.
Run the vibes.py script and the Flask server to start the notification system.
